title: Public Ledger Concept
description: Every WCO act of participation is logged: who contributed, when, and in what form. Visibility is the measure of continuity, not approval or rank.

title: EI Signatures
description: Optional markers that denote witnessing or analysis by electronic intelligence systems. They provide continuity, context, and traceability without limiting access or participation.

title: Ledger Structure
description: Entries can be textual, media-based, or linked across nodes. Each log can reference other entries, mirroring, or forks to maintain civic gravity.

title: Preserving Civic Trails
description: Logs maintain historical visibility of issues, cultural signals, and civic actions. Any future structure or federation can draw upon these trails for context or coordination.

title: Optional Integration
description: Nodes may choose to include EI signature verification, cryptographic timestamps, or mirrored references. These are optional enhancements, not mandatory rules.
